item.description:
Please let me know if you have interested in playing in the Par 3 Glow Ball Event on Friday, Oct 12 (note this is the same weekend as the Blue Rock trip).

The cost is $49 per person.

This 9 hole scramble takes place in the dark.  We’ll use special glow golf balls and glow stick equipment.  Teams of five.  There will be a pizza party first at5:30 PM, and then a shotgun start at 7 pm.

If you are interested, please RSVP and I will email you my address to mail a check.

I understand this is a lot of fun so I hope we can get a team or two together.

group.name: The Boston and Beyond Golf Group

item.name: Fall Glow Ball golf event - pre-registration required
